name: Werewolf - Prelude
description:
Werewolf is a survival horror game created in a month for the TPS Winter Game Jam. It is a puzzle survival game with light horror. The goal of the game is to escape the house without, ya know, dying. This is the prelude, the full game is expected early 2022. This will give some backstory and extra lore. 



Story Looking for help after your car broke down in the woods, you came across an old house. Nobody answered the door, so you assumed it was abandoned and went inside. However, when you went inside, the door locked behind you and there was a howling noise. Now, you must get out, or die trying. 
Features
  • Big house to explore
  • No scripted jumpscares
  • Smart wolf AI
  • Logical puzzles
  • Secrets!
  • Darkness

Thank you for playing, enjoy!

Hints
  • Look at your objectives if you aren’t sure what to do next
  • Can’t find the next clue? Make sure to check all the drawers and doors
  • The pistol will stun the wolf for a few seconds, allowing you to hide
  • Don’t make too much noise or the wolf will come investigate
  • Remember that padlocks take a second to open if you get the code right
  • Make sure to save often!
